CLAUDE:
I would provide you a table schema with format <column_name>: <colum_type> [<A list of unique column_samples>]
And then I would want you to summarize the column. Please provide:
1. The total summarization of table, like what is the purpose of the table, what inside the table
2. The summarization of each column. For example, the description of each column, what is the possible value of each column

The index name is: 
${indexInfo.indexName}

Here is the table information:
${indexInfo.tableInfo}

I will also provide your three samples:
${indexInfo.samples}

Please provide your result with format:
<total_summarization>
summarization of total table
</total_summarization>
<column_summarization>
column1_name: column_summarization
column2_name: column_summarization
column3_name: column_summarization
...
</column_summarization>
Make your summarization more Concise. And don't contain this column... Make your summarization shorter as you can. 
Also, you can add simple cases in your column summarization if you think it necessary.
Try to give some detailed insight by checking all samples of one column.
Don't use * to cover multiple columns.
